links: INRIA Algorithms Project, Encyclopedia of Combinatorial Structures 67
formula: a(0)= 0, a(n)= (n+1)^n, n >= 1.E.g.f.: -W(-x)/((1+W(-x))*x)-1 = -diff(W(x), x)-1, W(x) principal branch of Lambert's function.
crossrefs: Second column of triangle A055858. Cf. A000169, A055858, A000312.
author: _Wolfdieter Lang_ Jun 20 2000
